Present Working Details:
Company                             : Sathavahana Ispat Limited
Experience                           : 1 Year 10 Months (From June 2015 to till Date)
Designation                          : Electrical  Engineer
Type of role                          : Clearing the electrical faults, which are occurred during  
         power generation.
                                               : Daily calculations of export power readings and reporting to    
                                                  KPTCL persons.
                                               : Maintenance of both LT and HT motors
                                                  
                                               
About company: Sathavahana is a  50MW power generating plant,In which 20MW generation is
from waste heat that is WHRB(Waste heat Recovery Boiler) and other 30MW is generating from 
steam coal, that is CFBC(Circulated Fluidised Bed Combustion) boiler.
 

ACADEMIC PROJECT:
  Main Project:
    Project Title: Design and Development of Energy Free Solar Street LED Light System.
      Description:  The main aim of this project is to design and develop the energy free solar
street led light system from solar panel by continuously tracking the sun rays. The purpose
of the project is to implement a system to continuously track the sun rays with the help of
the solar panel and grasping the maximum power from the sun by rotating the solar panel
according to the sun rays direction with respect to time.
